document.full_text: north korea is holding around 200,000 people in huge political prison camps where inmates are forced to work in conditions approaching slavery and are often tortured, amnesty international said on tuesday.
document.title: north korea holding 200,000 political prisoners: amnesty
lines_and_colors: north korea is holding around 200,000 people in huge political prison camps where inmates are forced to work in conditions approaching slavery and are often tortured, amnesty international said on tuesday.
